title: Whats ruling reciting Quran and giving it to Dead
transcript: the ruling on reciting Quran and giving it to the Dead the reward the answer is this is an innovation so many people died at the time of the Prophet never ever once he told us to recite the Quran and give them the reward he allowed us forj he allowed us for he allowed us for uh uh supplicating and invoking Allah for them but never ever the prophet Alat wasam allowed us to recite the Quran and to give it for uh the deceased she third
